channel.title: My Astro Blog
channel.description: A humble Astronaut's guide to the stars

item.title: Why is this CSS so weird?
item.description: The global css file for this site is a bit different than I’d write things normally, but I’m trying to keep you from having to write a bunch of random classes.
item.author: Anna Dixon

item.title: Building an Astro Post Tag Component
item.description: In this project, we’ll build out a custom Astro component for post tags.
item.author: Anna Dixon

item.title: JavaScript SchmavaScript
item.description: This is a blog post about the JavaScript programming language. Like it, love it, hate it, it's here to stay.
item.author: Victoria Greenfelder

item.title: Beginning with CSS
item.description: CSS is a great way to style your website. In fact, there are no alternatives! Learn how to use it here.
item.author: Darnell McClure

item.title: Running out of sample post ideas
item.description: Sometimes you just run out of ideas for sample blog posts. It’s no one’s fault, it’s just the way it is.
item.author: Victoria Greenfelder
